Description:
Verify that items from the personal toolbar folder are properly
      added/deleted.

Verify that double-clicking on a bookmark causes it to be launched in
      a browser window

Verify that changes to an item are saved without loss of item
      integrity.
surf using user-defined 'custom keyword'.
sort and reverse-sort per column
Show and hide columns.

Currently, it is my understanding that there will be no new features
      in this area

Determine whether text copied from a formatted web page (such as
      within a table) has a "non-annoying" layout.

Determine whether native and non-native images are correctly copied
      to the system Clipboard.

Determine whether extremely large images can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether text outputted by JavaScript is properly
      copied.

Verify that browser contents can be dragged to
      a Composer or Compose Mail window.

Confirm that text, links, and images dragged to a
      non-modal dialog are handled properly

Confirm that dragging a directory
      to the browser window displays the folder contents

Feature: D&D from the desktop – Plug-in files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a helper-application
       file to the browser window opens the file
       properly

Verify that items dragged from a
       Find File window are handled properly
       (Windows / Mac OS)

Feature:
D&D <a href="/drag-url-browser-toolbar/">
      Given link is non-fetchable, non-retrievable Personal Toolbar
Description: Determine if you can drag items to and from the Personal Toolbar

Verify that you can drag a bookmark from the Bookmarks menu
      to the Personal Toolbar.

113893Implement New Form Functionality

Verify that you can save a form's data from the edit menu.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the
      popup dialog box and you click yes.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled,
      that you are given the pre-fill dialog and when you click ok, the
      information is filled into the form.

Verify that if you delete data in the Form Manager then
      click cancel, the data has not been deleted

Verify that there are "Big tooltips" - Similar to popup help for

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content.

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a section for an

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a tutorial on how to do
        better searches

Verify that minimization, maximize and close buttons of the toolbar

Determine whether Instant Messenger help content displays

Determine whether What's new in Netscape 6 displays correctly
Determine whether Security and Privacy displays correctly
Determine whether Streamlined Interface displays correctly

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop

Verify that the correct link is recorded after a server

Verify that double-clicking on a history link causes it to be

Change the History View to Group by Day|Site|None
sort and reverse-sort per column

Determine that you are able to set image as wallpaper.

Determine whether reloaded web pages properly display images

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a

Determine whether animated GIFs continue to animate after an

Determine whether an automatically updated web cam continues to

Test applets with liveconnect

Verify that the master password is visually distinctive from other

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
